'''Mist Flowers''' are objects found in [[Teyvat]]. Every 4.5 seconds, Mist Flowers will deal '''300% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Cryo DMG}} around themselves. When hit by a {{Pyro}} attack, they will be extinguished, allowing the player to harvest a {{Item|Mist Flower Corolla|20}}.
